Key Match Events: Ismaël Koné scored in the 22nd minute for Canada
Jonathan David scored in the 80th minute for Canada
Rodrigo Bentancur scored in the 8th minute for Uruguay
Luis Suárez scored in the 90'+2 for Uruguay
The match went to a penalty shootout where Uruguay won 4-3
Post-Match Reflections: Uruguay manager blasts Copa América organizers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Bank of America Stadium in Charlotte, North Carolina
Others: The 2024 Copa América third-place playoff match was played between Canada and Uruguay
